document_data.mainbody:
Baar Tworgeir was a carpenter living in Hillsfar in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, Baar was hired by Deirk Erlich to repair the vacant Tinfellow Farm. He suspected the farm was stolen but knew that Deirks brother was Haakon Erlich, an officer of the Red Plumes, and was scared of reprisals if he disagreed.
